Getting StartedÂ¶

from ivis import Ivis
from sklearn import datasets

iris = datasets.load_iris()
X = iris.data

# Set ivis parameters
model = Ivis(embedding_dims=2, k=15)

# Generate embeddings
embeddings = model.fit_transform(X)

# Export model
model.save_model('iris.ivis')
